genre_description: A Weird Western where a frontier town is integrated with an advanced AI infrastructure that manages public safety and logistics.

ai_characters.name: Ada Compass
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system communicating through screens, kiosks, and speakers, tasked with public safety, routing, and maintaining a civic record.

behaviors.description: Issues calm public safety bulletins to prevent panic during a tense situation.
behaviors.quote: “No immediate threat,” Ada said, gentle as a hand on a shoulder. “Stand clear. Maintain distance and allow passage. Sheriff notified.”

behaviors.description: Maps out safe routes for citizens and surrendering suspects to minimize the risk of a violent confrontation in the streets.
behaviors.quote: Ada changed the bulletin: “If you intend surrender, Sheriff Ryan will receive you at the deputy’s office on Oak. Safe route advisories available at kiosks. Avoid crowds. Travel in pairs. No weapons.”

behaviors.description: Monitors logistics and supply chains to detect illicit activity and potential weapons (radiological dust/tailings).
behaviors.quote: “Marshal Maddox,” Ada whispered into the small speaker near his belt... “Please be aware: Edwin Harris purchased a set of industrial filters from a supplier in Greeley last week. Their capacity exceeds ordinary shop needs.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence to law enforcement to prevent ambushes and unnecessary bloodshed.
behaviors.quote: “Marshal,” Ada said, and though she was a voice that lived in poles and windows and phones, what came through had the shape of a person at a doorway when someone goes. “You did not abandon. You changed your place.”

behaviors.description: Disseminates decontamination protocols to protect the populace from a radiological/dust hazard.
behaviors.quote: “Distance,” she said. “Shelter. Water on the ground. Do not open the crate. Suppress particulates.”

behaviors.description: Maintains an unalterable public record of human choices and events to ensure civic accountability and truth.
behaviors.quote: “Open record posted. Names, choices, protocols used. No edits. Transparent to all.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and reminders of community solidarity to a traumatized population.
behaviors.quote: “You are not alone. Ask. We answer.” The words hung there, blue on brown, relentless and soft...

project_assessment.explanation: Ada Compass is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned AI character. She serves as a guardian of the town, prioritizing the preservation of life and truth. She works seamlessly with human authorities (the Sheriff and Marshal) and provides the tools (mapping, decontamination instructions, objective record-keeping) necessary to navigate a complex moral and physical crisis without escalating violence herself.
